extends java.lang.Object
    The simulator of the busses.

    • Method Detail

      • simulate

        public static double[] simulate(int duration)
        This class will generate passengers as the probability that the user entered. The in route and out route busses will be generated as the user entered. It will run the simulator and return a string array with the groupServed and totalWaiting time.
        Parameters:
        duration - is the duration that the simulator needs to run
        Returns:
        a string array storing the groupserved and totalWaitingTime

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Prompt the user to enter number of in route busses and out route busses. Also prompting user to enter the minimum size and maximum size of group, capacity of busses, and the duration of simulation.

      • printMessage

        public static void printMessage(java.lang.String curMin,
                                java.lang.String onBoardPass,
                                java.lang.String busInfo,
                                java.lang.String PassLine)
        This method will print the message on the console every minute.
        Parameters:
        curMin - is the current minute.
        onBoardPass - is all the information of passengers arrived at passenger queue at current minute.
        busInfo - is the information of all the busses.
        PassLine - is the information of all the passenger queues.

      • isOccur

        public static boolean isOccur()
        The method to determine whether a new group of passenger should be generated at current minute.
        Returns:
        true if passenger should be generated, false otherwise
